titleStmt.title: At the committee of the militia of London the 3d. of Iune, 1648. Ordered, that Major Generall Skippon be desired to give orders to Colonell Manwaring and Colonell Webb, and the rest of the gentlemen, to the effect, as in the following writing.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Committee for the Militia.

notesStmt.note: Title from caption of first article.
Also includes orders from the Committee of the Militia dated: 10 June 1648; 20 June 1648; 2 August 1648.
Signed: Adam Banckes Clerk to the said Committee.
Reproduction of the originals in the British Library (Thomason Tracts, reel 246) and the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (Early English books, 1641-1700, reel 2184).
